DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect breakfast skipping ( SKIP ) vs. consumption high protein solid ( HP-S ) breakfast vs. consumption high protein beverage ( HP-B ) breakfast daily appetite control , food craving , food intake , sleep quality young adult .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects High Protein Breakfast Appetite Sleep Young Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Young adult consume follow breakfast ( randomize order ) 7 days/pattern : 350kcal HP breakfast ( 30g protein ) solid beverage form skip breakfast . During breakfast treatment period , participant provide isocaloric breakfast meal contain 34 % protein ( 30g protein ) , 40 % CHO , 26 % fat . The participant consume meal day throughout 7 day test period . During breakfast skipping treatment period , participant skip breakfast every morning nothing eat drink ( besides water ) 12:00 pm . During acclimation day ( i.e. , day 1-6 ) , participant eat breakfast home work simply skip morning meal . An actigraph ( assess key index sleep ) continuously worn sleep diary complete 7 test day . During afternoon Day 3 , participant arrive University Missouri-Physical Activity Wellness Center ( MU-PAW ) fit Continuous Glucose Monitor ( CGM ) measure glycemic control next 3 day . On day 6 , participant complete hourly appetite questionnaire , consume standardized dinner meal , complete salivary sample prior sleep onset ( sleep relate hormone ) . On 7th day pattern , participant report MU-PAW morning complete respective test day . The participant begin test day either skip breakfast consume respective breakfast meal . Blood sample , salivary sample , assessment perceive appetite collected/completed specific time throughout day . Prior lunch , brain scan complete use functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) identify bain activation pattern response food picture . Following fMRI , participant provide standardized lunch . The participant complete remainder test day . An ad libitum food buffet provide participant consume departure home throughout remainder day . . They continue wear actigraph eat/drink ad libitum packout cooler go bed even . Lastly , participant complete salivary sample sleep diary immediately bed . Between day 8-10 , participant return test day equipment packout cooler , include empty wrapper uneaten food . A 3-7 day washout period occur pattern participant return habitual ( i.e . pre-study ) breakfast behavior . Study outcomes include morning , mid-day , afternoon , even appetite , satiety , pleasure , perceive energy/sleepiness , hormonal response ( plasma glucose , insulin , ghrelin , PYY , melatonin , cortisol concentration ) , sleep index ( i.e total sleep time , sleep efficiency , perceive sleep quality ) , brain activation pattern , even energy intake , daily energy intake .
DOC.criteria: age 2032y BMI 2230kg/m2 nonsmoker , nonuser tobacco product generally healthy ( assessed Medical History Questionnaire ) righthanded ( fMRI requirement ) pregnant lactate past 6 month clinically diagnose eat disorder metabolic , hormonal , and/or neural conditions/diseases/medications influence metabolism food intake know bleed disorder currently previously ( In past 6 month ) weight loss special diet weight loss/gain ( > 10lbs ) past 6 month normal cognitive restraint , assess score < 4 Three Factors Eating Habits Questionnaire ( TFEQ ) rating â‰¥ 5 illustrate minimum `` neither like dislike '' 9point hedonic scale rating study breakfast clinically diagnose obstructive sleep apnea insomnia participate shiftwork The potential participant exclude meet inclusion criterion .
